scripts.dev: npm run tsc --workspace=rock_types && npm run build:app && npm run dev:api
scripts.build:api: npm run tsc --workspace=rock_types && npm run build --workspace=api
scripts.start:api: npm run tsc --workspace=rock_types && npm run start --workspace=api
scripts.dev:api: npm run tsc --workspace=rock_types && npm run build:app && npm run dev --workspace=api
scripts.test:api: npm run tsc --workspace=rock_types && npm run test --workspace=api
scripts.build:app: npm run tsc --workspace=rock_types && npm run build --workspace=app
scripts.start:app: npm run tsc --workspace=rock_types && npm run start --workspace=app
scripts.dev:app: npm run tsc --workspace=rock_types && npm run start --workspace=app
scripts.test:app: npm run tsc --workspace=rock_types && npm run test --workspace=app
